languages.text: {n}Абеляр быстро, но придирчиво оглядывает вас, будто сканируя взглядом в поисках оплошностей и недостатков. Затем учтиво кивает:{/n} "Лорд-капитан".
{n}Abelard surveys you briskly but meticulously, as though he is inspecting you for shortcomings. Then he offers a courteous nod.{/n} "Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр быстро, но придирчиво оглядывает вас, будто сканируя взглядом в поисках оплошностей и недостатков. Затем учтиво кивает:{/n} "Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard surveys you briskly but meticulously, as though he is inspecting you for shortcomings. Then he offers a courteous nod.{/n} "Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德简要而细致地打量着你，仿佛在检查你身上的不足之处。随后，他彬彬有礼地向你点头致意。{/n}“舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard surveys you briskly but meticulously, as though he is inspecting you for shortcomings. Then he offers a courteous nod.{/n} "Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德简要而细致地打量着你，仿佛在检查你身上的不足之处。随后，他彬彬有礼地向你点头致意。{/n}“舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Abelard surveys you briskly but meticulously, as though he is inspecting you for shortcomings. Then he offers a courteous nod.{/n} "Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Abelard te mira de forma breve pero meticulosa, como si estuviera buscando carencias en ti. Después, asiente cortésmente.{/n} «Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard surveys you briskly but meticulously, as though he is inspecting you for shortcomings. Then he offers a courteous nod.{/n} "Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard te mira de forma breve pero meticulosa, como si estuviera buscando carencias en ti. Después, asiente cortésmente.{/n} «Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはあなたの欠点を調べるかのように、細心の注意をはらいながらあなたを観察する。そして、礼儀正しく頷いた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard surveys you briskly but meticulously, as though he is inspecting you for shortcomings. Then he offers a courteous nod.{/n} "Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはあなたの欠点を調べるかのように、細心の注意をはらいながらあなたを観察する。そして、礼儀正しく頷いた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard mustert dich knapp, aber äußerst sorgfältig, als würde er dich auf Unzulänglichkeiten überprüfen. Dann nickt er höflich.{/n} "Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard surveys you briskly but meticulously, as though he is inspecting you for shortcomings. Then he offers a courteous nod.{/n} "Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard mustert dich knapp, aber äußerst sorgfältig, als würde er dich auf Unzulänglichkeiten überprüfen. Dann nickt er höflich.{/n} "Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard vous observe rapidement et méticuleusement à la fois, comme s'il cherchait un défaut dans votre apparence, puis il vous adresse un hochement de tête courtois.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard surveys you briskly but meticulously, as though he is inspecting you for shortcomings. Then he offers a courteous nod.{/n} "Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard vous observe rapidement et méticuleusement à la fois, comme s'il cherchait un défaut dans votre apparence, puis il vous adresse un hochement de tête courtois.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, çabuk ama titiz bir şekilde seni süzüyor. Hatalarını tespit etmeye çalışıyor sanki. Ardından kibarca baş sallıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan."
